message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I need to make a profit. I can do $125, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $125 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $115?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we won't be able to come to an agreement. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer $127.50
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $127.50 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $115 again?
I'm not willing to go back to $115, but I can see you're serious about buying the product. I'll meet you at $125, but that's my final offer
I'm not willing to go above $120, as that's the price I've been considering all along. Would you be willing to meet me at $120?
